label: 御読経
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A four-day event held twice a year, in the second and eighth or third and ninth months, in the palace as well as the homes of the highest nobles.  The sutra ceremonially read was the Daihannya-kyō (Skt. Mahâprajñâpâramitâ-sûtra, Greater Sutra on the Perfection of Wisdom").[大般若経][RK]"
